asposehtmlcloud.api package¶

Submodules¶

asposehtmlcloud.api.html_api module¶

class asposehtmlcloud.api.html_api.HtmlApi(config=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

GetConvertDocumentToImage(name, out_format, **kwargs)¶

Convert the HTML, EPUB, SVG documents from the storage by its name to the specified image format.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • name (str) – Document name (html, epub, svg formats). (required)
  • out_format (str) – Resulting image format (jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif). (required)
  • width (int) – Resulting image width.
  • height (int) – Resulting image height.
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting image margin.
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting image margin.
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting image margin.
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting image margin.
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image.
  • folder (str) – The source document folder.
  • storage (str) – The source document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
GetConvertDocumentToImageByUrl(source_url, out_format, **kwargs)¶

Convert the HTML page from the web by its URL to the specified image format.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • source_url (str) – Source page URL. (required)
  • out_format (str) – Resulting image format(jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif). (required)
  • width (int) – Resulting image width.
  • height (int) – Resulting image height.
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting image margin.
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting image margin.
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting image margin.
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting image margin.
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image.
  • folder (str) – The document folder.
  • storage (str) – The document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
GetConvertDocumentToMarkdown(name, **kwargs)¶

Converts the HTML document (located on storage) to Markdown and returns resulting file in response content.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • name (str) – Document name. (required)
  • use_git (str) – Use Git Markdown flavor to save (“true” or “false”).
  • folder (str) – Source document folder.
  • storage (str) – Source document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

GetDocumentFragmentByCssSelector(name, selector, out_format, **kwargs)¶

Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified CSS selector.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • name (str) – The document name (required). Presented as zip archive with one html file in the root or html file.
  • selector (str) – CSS selector string. (required)
  • out_format (str) – Output format. Possible values: ‘plain’ and ‘json’. (required)
  • folder (str) – The document folder.
  • storage (str) – The document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

GetMergeHtmlTemplate(template_name, data_path, **kwargs)¶

Populate HTML document template with data located as a file in the storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • template_name (str) – Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML. (required)
  • data_path (str) – Data source file path in the storage. Supported data format: XML (required)
  • options (str) – Template merge options: reserved for further implementation.
  • folder (str) – The template document folder.
  • storage (str) – The template document and data source storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
PostConvertDocumentInRequestToImage(out_path, out_format, file, **kwargs)¶

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (in request content) to the specified image format and uploads resulting file to storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • out_path (str) – Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.jpg) (required)
  • out_format (str) – (jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif)(required)
  • file (file) – A file to be converted. (required)
  • width (int) – Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch).
  • height (int) – Resulting document page height in points (1/96 inch).
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
PostConvertDocumentInRequestToMarkdown(out_path, file, **kwargs)¶

Converts the HTML document (in request content) to Markdown and uploads resulting file to storage by specified path.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • out_path (str) – Full resulting file path in the storage (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.md) (required)
  • file (file) – A file to be converted. (required)
  • use_git (str) – Use Git Markdown flavor to save (“true” or “false”).
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

PostMergeHtmlTemplate(template_name, out_path, file, **kwargs)¶

Populate HTML document template with data from the request body. Result document will be saved to storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • template_name (str) – Template document name. Template document is HTML or zipped HTML. (required)
  • out_path (str) – Result document path. (required)
  • file (file) – A data file to populate template. (required)
  • options (str) – Template merge options: reserved for further implementation.
  • folder (str) – The template document folder.
  • storage (str) – The template document and data source storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
PutConvertDocumentToImage(name, out_path, out_format, **kwargs)¶

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (located on storage) to the specified image format and uploads resulting file to storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • name (str) – Document name. (required)
  • out_path (str) – Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.jpg) (required)
  • out_format (str) – (jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif)(required)
  • width (int) – Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch).
  • height (int) – Resulting document page height in points (1/96 inch).
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.
  • folder (str) – The source document folder.
  • storage (str) – The source and resulting document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (in request content) to the specified image format and uploads resulting file to storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • out_path (str) – Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.jpg) (required)
  • out_format (str) – (jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif)(required)
  • file (file) – A file to be converted. (required)
  • width (int) – Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch).
  • height (int) – Resulting document page height in points (1/96 inch).
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.

Converts the HTML, EPUB, SVG document (located on storage) to the specified image format and uploads resulting file to storage.

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • name (str) – Document name. (required)
  • out_path (str) – Full resulting filename (ex. /folder1/folder2/result.jpg) (required)
  • out_format (str) – (jpeg, png, bmp, tiff, gif)(required)
  • width (int) – Resulting document page width in points (1/96 inch).
  • height (int) – Resulting document page height in points (1/96 inch).
  • left_margin (int) – Left resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • right_margin (int) – Right resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • top_margin (int) – Top resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • bottom_margin (int) – Bottom resulting document page margin in points (1/96 inch).
  • resolution (int) – Resolution of resulting image. Default is 96 dpi.
  • folder (str) – The source document folder.
  • storage (str) – The source and resulting document storage.
Returns:

File. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

  • src_storage_name (str) – Source storage name
  • dest_storage_name (str) – Destination storage name
Returns:

None. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
objectExists(path, **kwargs)¶

Check if file or folder exists

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • path (str) – File or folder path e.g. ‘/file.ext’ or ‘/folder’ (required)
  • storage_name (str) – Storage name
  • version_id (str) – File version ID
Returns:

ObjectExist. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.

uploadFile(path, file, **kwargs)¶

Upload file

This method makes a synchronous HTTP request by default. To make an asynchronous HTTP request, please pass async_req=True

Parameters:
  • async_req (bool) – Asynchronous request
  • path (str) – Path where to upload including filename and extension e.g. /file.ext or /Folder 1/file.ext If the content is multipart and path does not contains the file name it tries to get them from filename parameter from Content-Disposition header. (required)
  • file (file) – File to upload (required)
  • storage_name (str) – Storage name
Returns:

FilesUploadResult. If the method is called asynchronously, returns the request thread.
